title: Main Index Navigation Bar Update
details:
Updated the VaultIndexProcessor.cs to add only the Dashboard and Classes Assignments links to the main index.

Previous behavior:
- Main index had no navigation links
- Non-main indices had Back, Home, Dashboard, and Classes Assignments links

New behavior:
- Main index now shows Dashboard and Classes Assignments links (no Back or Home since it's already at the root)
- Non-main indices continue to show Back, Home, Dashboard, and Classes Assignments links

This change ensures that users have consistent access to Dashboard and Classes Assignments regardless of which index page they're viewing, while avoiding redundant navigation options at the root level.

Also ensured that folders starting with a period are excluded from the main index, which was already implemented for other levels.
